tab.name: Depth of Knowledge
tab.excellent: Clear fundamentals & able to correlate / apply into all situations
tab.veryGood: Clear fundamentals & able to correlate / apply into some situations
tab.good: Reasonably clear fundamentals & able to correlate / apply into few situations
tab.average: Some clarity on fundamentals. Able to apply with support
tab.notSuitable: Lacks Clarity. Is not able to apply even after support.

tab.name: Breadth of Knowledge
tab.excellent: Answers with ease questions on most subjects studied
tab.veryGood: Answers with ease questions on many subjects studied
tab.good: Answers questions on many subjects but takes time / effort to do so
tab.average: Able to answer questions only on recently studied subjects
tab.notSuitable: Unable to answer questions even on recently studied subjects

tab1.name: Has clear well-structured thoughts
tab1.excellent: Grasps all aspects of problems & solves them on his own in a clear, well-structured manner
tab1.veryGood: Grasps most aspects of problems & attempts to solve on his own through a structured approach with some success
tab1.good: Grasps few aspects of problems & tries to solve through a structured approach with some support
tab1.average: Takes time to grasp some aspects of problems, achieve clarity & adopt a structured approach
tab1.notSuitable: Is confused, cannot think through the problem

tab1.name: Takes logical decisions is the given hypothetical situation
tab1.excellent: Breaks the problem/s into smaller parts, considers various options, provides logic/rationale and arrives at creative/most optimal solution
tab1.veryGood: Breaks the problem/s and considers various options, however arrives at an acceptable solution (on his/her own)
tab1.good: Breaks the problem/s provides logic/rationale and arrives at a solution with support
tab1.average: Requires support in breaking down the problems into manageable parts
tab1.notSuitable: Not able to break the problem in smaller part even with support

tab2.name: Initiate to develop his area of interest
tab2.excellent: Reads & researches about a topic of interest & makes effort to develop expertise
tab2.veryGood: Show a good level of knowledge in areas of interest
tab2.good: Show a satisfactory level of knowledge in areas of interest
tab2.average: Has superficial knowledge in the areas of interest mentioned
tab2.notSuitable: Does not have any specific area of interest

tab2.name: Exhibits interest beyond curriculum
tab2.excellent: Actively involved in many extra/co-curricular activities & has several significant achievements
tab2.veryGood: Involved in many extra/co-curricular activities & has Some achievements
tab2.good: Involved in some extra/co-curricular activities & has few achievements
tab2.average: Has participated in some extra/co-curricular activities
tab2.notSuitable: Has not participated in any extra/co-curricular activities

tab3.name: English Language Proficiency
tab3.excellent: Uses language easily & fluently. Has a facility with words. Speaks in a clear 6 audible tone. Uses flow charts/sketches when necessary
tab3.veryGood: Use of language is reasonable good. Speaks in a clear & audible tone. Often uses flow charts/sketches
tab3.good: Language unimpressive but manages to explain by flow charts/sketch
tab3.average: Able to explain only with flow charts/sketches
tab3.notSuitable: Can neither explain orally nor by drawing

tab3.name: Precision in responding to questions
tab3.excellent: Gives precise to the point answer
tab3.veryGood: Answers not precise but gets many key points across
tab3.good: Answers may be disorganised but gets a New key points across
tab3.average: Speaks in a round-about manner, able to convey some key points with support
tab3.notSuitable: Speaks in a round-about manner, not able to convey the key points at all

tab4.name: Confidence level exhibited during interview
tab4.excellent: Composed, maintains good posture & eye contact throughout
tab4.veryGood: Becomes comfortable given a little time, maintains good posture & eye contact for most of the time
tab4.good: Takes some time to become comfortable. Maintains moderate posture & eye contact intermittently
tab4.average: Takes a log time to become comfortable. Maintains moderate posture, shies from eye contact
tab4.notSuitable: Is visible anxious, does not respond to questions coherently

tab4.name: Conviction in answers
tab4.excellent: Has a clear step by step approach to explaining concepts, Seeks clarification if required & confidently arrives at the right answer
tab4.veryGood: Gives only obvious answers but is confident of the same
tab4.good: Sticks to answer though low on clarity either in approach or concept
